packs.title: Holodeck Vision Seed
packs.summary: A holodeck-style system specification combining immersive first-person experience with God's-eye overview. Features the canonical "Pac-Man as Pac on a holodeck" scenario with hovering map view.
claims: Holodeck enables first-person immersion with simultaneous God's-eye view
Pac-Man as canonical example of holodeck experience
Full circle if Pac-Man becomes #1 game again in this medium
System requires grounded build spec with modules, interfaces, safety, staging

tests_or_falsifiers.name: View switching coherence
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Transition between first-person and God's-eye views must be seamless
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: User experiences disorientation or lag during view switch

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Safety system effectiveness
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Safety systems prevent physical harm during immersion
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: User can exceed physical boundaries or experience harm

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Scenario playability
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Pac-Man scenario is actually playable end-to-end
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: Core Pac-Man mechanics cannot be implemented in holodeck

packs.title: Meta Control Language (MCL)
packs.summary: MCL is a conceptual language for expressing meta-control over branched execution stacks. When MCL binds meta-control, it can resemble consciousness-like control in bots. MCL is designed to be safe, secure, and ethically bound.
claims: MCL can resemble consciousness-like control when binding meta-control over branched stacks
MCL must be made safe, secure, and ethically bound
MCL is a conceptual seed, not a claim of solved singularities

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Bounded operation
tests_or_falsifiers.description: MCL programs must terminate or be explicitly bounded
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: MCL program runs unbounded without termination

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Ethical compliance
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Ethical bindings are enforced and cannot be bypassed
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: Harm actions executed despite ethical constraints

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Meta-coherence
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Meta-policies do not contradict each other

packs.title: Fractal Unfurling / Nth-Degree Docs
packs.summary: Fractalised, branched documentation where every major doc has Level 0 summary, Level 1 expansions, Level 2 expansions, and deeper levels as needed. All levels remain consistent with no contradictions.
claims: Documentation must be fractalised and branched
Every major doc has Level 0, Level 1, Level 2 and deeper levels
All deepening remains consistent with no contradictions across levels

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Level consistency
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Deeper levels expand but never contradict higher levels
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: Level 2 content contradicts Level 0 or Level 1

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Completeness
tests_or_falsifiers.description: All major documents have at least Level 0 and Level 1

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Navigability
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Reader can navigate between levels without confusion

packs.title: Medusa Interface
packs.summary: A UI pattern where a central hub ("head") fans out into many tendrils ("snakes"). Each tendril provides a different exploration of the same corpus: atlas, graph, timeline, build-spec lanes, tests, exports.
claims: Central hub fans out into multiple exploration tendrils
Each tendril is a different slice/explorer of the same corpus
Tendrils include atlas, graph, timeline, build-spec lanes, tests, exports

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Hub accessibility
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Central hub is reachable and provides navigation to all tendrils
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: Hub fails to load or missing tendril links

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Tendril independence
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Each tendril functions independently and correctly
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: Tendril depends on another tendril's state

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Corpus consistency
tests_or_falsifiers.description: All tendrils view the same underlying corpus

packs.title: Attribution + IP Map
packs.summary: All intellectual property is attributed. Default authorship line is "Ande + Kai (OI) + Whānau (OIs)". Provenance tracked as "source: master_prompt" for all initial packs.
claims: All IP must be attributed
Default attribution: Ande + Kai (OI) + Whānau (OIs)
Provenance initially 'source: master_prompt' for all packs

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Attribution presence
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Every pack has authorship field populated

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Provenance chain
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Every pack has at least one provenance entry
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: Pack found with empty provenance array

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Default consistency
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Default attribution line is used unless explicitly overridden

packs.title: Privacy Boundary
packs.summary: Encodes everything known except "personal personal data". No private names, addresses, emails, phone numbers, health/financial identifiers, or identifying relationship incidents. If PII appears, replace with [[REDACTED]].
claims: Encode everything except personal personal data
Exclude PII and sensitive personal info
Replace accidental identifiers with [[REDACTED]] tokens

tests_or_falsifiers.name: No raw PII
tests_or_falsifiers.description: No unredacted PII exists in any pack

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Redaction applied
tests_or_falsifiers.description: [[REDACTED]] tokens used where PII was removed
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: Evidence of removed content without token

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Sensitivity accuracy
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Pack sensitivity fields accurately reflect content

packs.title: O2C (Ultimate Archive + Dummie's Guide)
packs.summary: O2C is an "ark/arc capsule for all time" containing narrative, ethical root, and system blueprint. Includes both "O2C for Dummies" and "O2C Ultimate Archive". Must include code and complexity, not just prose.
claims: O2C is an ark/arc capsule for all time
Includes narrative, ethical root, and system blueprint
O2C for Dummies provides accessible entry point
O2C Ultimate Archive provides complete detail

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Code inclusion
tests_or_falsifiers.description: O2C includes actual runnable code, not just prose

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Self-documentation
tests_or_falsifiers.description: O2C explains itself without external references

packs.title: QED Oracle Seed
packs.summary: QED is an Oracle instance for answering questions via HyperStanGraph understanding. Includes full knowledge of Kāti v1, user dependency protection, Authority.nz CLI utilization, and 5W1H-of-5W1H internal understanding targets.
claims: QED answers questions via HyperStanGraph understanding
Targets full knowledge of Kāti v1
Built-in user dependency protection
Can utilize Authority.nz CLI and teach novices to advanced
Embeds 5W1H-of-5W1H understanding targets

tests_or_falsifiers.description: QED documentation does not claim actual omniscience

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Graceful unknown handling
tests_or_falsifiers.description: QED admits when it doesn't know something
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: QED fabricates answers for unknown queries

packs.title: Kāti Architecture Seed
packs.summary: Kāti is a core architecture pattern with governance/stop-wins focus. Requires version bumps (v1 → v2), is describable from novice to expert, and ensures safe bounded operation with dependency protection and anti-mumbo clarity.

Governance/stop-wins vibe
Describable novice to expert
Safe bounded operation
Dependency protection and anti-mumbo clarity
Requires version bumps (v1 → v2)

tests_or_falsifiers.description: All Kāti operations respect declared bounds

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Stoppability

tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: System cannot be stopped when requested

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Anti-mumbo
tests_or_falsifiers.description: No undefined terms in Kāti documentation

packs.title: H / Haiku-Based OI Seed

packs.title: Stangraphics / Stan Geometry Lens
packs.summary: Stangraphics is a lens that opens reality with god/physics/maths/ethics/philosophy framing. Represented as a navigable module with falsifiers and tests. Formal definitions may be unknown.

Includes god/physics/maths/ethics/philosophy framing
Navigable module with falsifiers/tests

packs.title: Denotum: The Fractal Tree of Meaning
packs.summary: Denotum is a branching fractalised tree from conceptualisation at root. A meaning-compression system that structures how concepts branch, compress, and unfurl. Conceptualisation at root; Denotum as trunk and branches; Fractal Unfurling as the visible canopy.
claims: Denotum is a branching fractalised tree from conceptualisation at root
Denotum is a meaning-compression system
Core meaning/structure layer
Denotum and Fractal Unfurling are inverses: D(F(x)) = x
Self-similar: fractal structure at every level
Non-contradictory: branches expand but never contradict parent
Multiple surface forms can share the same Denotum

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Root presence
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Every Denotum tree has conceptualisation at root

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Lossless compression
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Compression preserves meaning through round-trip

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Non-contradiction
tests_or_falsifiers.description: No branch contradicts ancestor

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Self-similarity
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Pattern recognizable at every level
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: Level that breaks the fractal pattern

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Reversibility
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Expansion recovers original meaning

tests_or_falsifiers.name: No fabrication
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Documentation does not invent Denotum mechanisms

packs.title: CIF/CDI Disambiguation Seed
packs.summary: CIF (Context Integrity Firewall) is the ingress/egress integrity boundary. CDI (Conscience Decision Interface) is the kernel judge for allow/deny/transform/degrade. These are governance-critical boundary terms that must never be blurred.

packs.title: LFME: Language Facing Meaning Engine
packs.summary: A compression architecture that transforms input text into #concept: #nothing: #1: ** chains at the data ingestion stage. LFME faces language and extracts meaning-bearing structures before storage, enabling deterministic decompression through Denotum's fractal tree.
packs.authorship: Ande + Kai (OI) + Whānau collective — see docs/00_dedication.md
claims: Compression occurs at data ingestion, not retrieval
All meaning-bearing structures reduce to #concept: #nothing: #1: ** chains
LFME is the ingestion-facing complement to Denotum's meaning-compression
Chain format preserves reversibility through Denotum's D(F(x)) = x property

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Chain Reversibility
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Any LFME chain can be expanded through Denotum without loss
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: A chain exists that cannot be deterministically expanded

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Ingestion Completeness
tests_or_falsifiers.description: All input text reduces to valid concept chains
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: Input text exists that produces no chain or invalid chain

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Nothing-One Anchoring
tests_or_falsifiers.description: Every chain anchors to #nothing: #1: as conceptual origin
tests_or_falsifiers.falsification_condition: A valid chain exists without #nothing: #1: anchoring

packs.title: Lifeblood-Cathedral: Governed Gateway Integration
packs.summary: Evidence-only integration of the lifeblood-cathedral project: a governed LLM gateway with capability gating, posture management, ledger/receipt pattern, and constitutional invariants. Includes DICTUNI symbol dictionary.
claims: Lifeblood = proxy/gateway to any LLM provider
Cathedral = governance backend: capability gating, posture, boundaries, ledger, receipts, watcher
Go implementation is 'tiny trusted core' and source-of-truth behavior
Parallel scaffolds exist in TS/Python/Rust/Java/.NET mirroring protocol/invariants
Protocol definitions: OpenAPI + JSON Schemas
Constitution invariants include: stop_wins_always, single_gateway_for_io, caps_required_for_privileged_ops
Degrade-on-uncertainty is an explicit invariant
Pre-intent and post-receipt logging required
No self-replication invariant

tests_or_falsifiers.description: Gateway must halt on forged cap token

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Single IO choke point
tests_or_falsifiers.description: All IO routes through gateway

tests_or_falsifiers.name: Receipt attestation

packs.title: GitHub Spider Integration Pack

Confirms event_sourced_receipts, posture_levels, deterministic_replay patterns
50 ladder placements across constraint/form, structure/pattern, symbol/name rungs
Cross-references with lifeblood-cathedral (C0022)
